FuncDef: The display bgp vpnv6 slow-peer command displays information about slow BGP VPNv6 peers.

ParaDef.Info:
Specify a VPN-Instance (VRF) name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp vpnv6 vpn-instance vpn1 slow-peer
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp vpnv6 slow-peer command displays information about slow BGP VPNv6 peers.
